original_title: Lajko Felix: In Search for Myself
overview: Short musical film about one of the greatest violinist in Europe, Lajko Felix.  This is a story about his journey through music and his own way of living with it.  Lajko use a violin to create magic musical world witch doesnâ€™t have nether one rule.  His world is world without logic fill out with different musical colors.
title: Lajko Felix: In Search for Myself
